chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February, 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.

listitem.para: 1931 - Wednesday. Didn't get fooled. Hooray. Got up at 7 for French. Got Excellent in Music. Studied & fooled tonite G'nite!
1932 - Fri. Fooled twice! Asked Chubby about note etc. Roller skated with Challis this aft! Met more kids! Lecture with Peg Handy tonite & loads of fun with our Georges afterwards!

1933 - Sat. Up & said goodby to Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie. Fine trip but rain & arrived at 2:45. Down to Sally's after fond greeting with Muz.(?) etc. Dance at Roosevelt (me with Bill). Keeno! I love him more than ever. Home & bed late.

1934 - Sun. Whole family to Church! Fun! Looey & Jack behind us! Bill here. Swell kid. Mashed finger nail! John left after gang for dinner. Sad. June etc. came, McKallips, John K, tonite & sat for an hour at radio. We got Venezula. Nice to me but I missed Bill!

1935 - Mon. Up at 7:30 & fooled right off by M.W. I fooled Earl Mortimer, however, on the bus. Met Tony in N.Y. & she & Bobby Bryan & I lunched. Ride on bus with Andy & arrived 8:30. Art Keown here & I thot of Bill. Good to see kids, but talked too much. Bill asked the boss & he will most likely come to Prom. I'm so excited, I can't see strait.
1931 - Thursday. Skipped school this aft. Pegsie, Sally & I saw "Millie" & "Honor Among Lovers"- good. Over at Peggy's tonite & said "goom bye."
1932 - Sat. Up at 8:45. Peggy came! To town & hunted Phil Cook, Pitt etc. Movies "Strangers in Love." Fredric March good! B.B. game at Y. Lost 25-22. Party at Sally's. PT & I with Ralph. Ride. Late!

1933 - Sun. Up & to church with fambly. Bill here! A bit cool. Sally up for dinner. Ginny & I bowled this aft. Took her all around & then to Sally's with gang for supper. Joey queer. Home & talked & bed early.

1934 - Mon. Up late. Packed. Bill came with roller skates & got me wine. Said he came last nite. Damn! Said g'bye to everybody. Will miss Mom 'n Pop. Swell vacation, di! Bridge with Pinx & Sarah & I on train.

1935 - Tues. Classes again. Saw about my cut(?) Worked on turtles in Physiology. Tired. Almost mad at Prill because I haven't forgotten last week. Washed clothes & hair after test at gym. German & bed not too early.
1931 - Friday. Peggy left today. It rained all day. Saw Aunt Hat at the Emericks. Bed late tonite.
1932 - Sunday. Up at 11:30. Peggy & I called on Phil Cook, Mrs. Jackson. Lunch & Bill R here. To C. Davis's & Moody Berg's. Then Sally here. To New Brighton - Townsends, J. Daby. Home. Read.

1933 - Mon. To village in a.m. for Hygiene junk. Ginny & Sally & I to town. Shopped. Then met Jane Griffiths at Wm Penn for lunch. Movies "Christopher Stong." Keen. Out to Griffiths. P.C. W. Movies tonite with kids (& John) " Tonite is Ours". Good. Bed late.

1934 - Tues. Train late on account of our car & hot box at 3:30 a.m. Got here about 12:45. Fixed up my room. 2 classes. Yelled at everybody. Came back & cleaned etc. all aft. Supper. Studed. Bed late.
1935 - Wed. Oh hell - I'm very behind in you, di. This was the 2nd day of classes. Worked about. Chem lab terrific as usual. Home & studied for tomorrow.
1931 - Saturday. Franny home. Went to town wif Muvver. We bought me clothes etc. Franny, Terry & Sally here tonite. Loads of fun.
1932 - Monday. Up late. Charlotte Davis, Peggy & I to town to "Tarzan." Good! Home. Peggy left as Bill, Dan & Ralph came. Boohoo! Back to studying tonite!

1933 - Tues. Dentist in a.m. & oculist & then to see Aunt Hat. Packed & sat around. Left at 4 for Carlisle. Arrived at 10. Sad. Wish I could have been home longer! Fun in car, tho. Ginny cute. Called Mother tonite. Bed at Argonne.
1934 - Wed. At it again full force. A quiz D- & an awful lit paper back. But no gym, thank heavens. Studied Bible in libe & wrote letters tonite.
1935 - Thurs. Trying to get used to classes. Physiology & fun. Missed tea at Agora. B. Clark & I decided to play tennis, but there wasn't any. To vill & ate. Home & studied a bit tonite.
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & church mit John & Mumsie. John left this aft. Franny & Crutchy tonite. Boo hoo hoo!!
1932 - Tuesday. School again! Note to & from Chubby. Latin. Pinx & Moody after school. Took kids home. B.B. & roller skated with Handy & Challis tonite. Wrote Chubby & studied.

1933 - Wed. Up & said G'bye to Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie. Drove all day & arrived New Haven at 5:20. Keen day & trip. Saw oodles of places. New York. Fine rooms at Y.W.C.A. Movies tonite "Gabriel Over the White House." Good. Bed late.
1934 - Thurs. First Zo class. We're still behind. Got B- in Bible quiz. Conf with Miss Coolidge. Like her heaps! Oh that quiz! Shower & dinner. Studied & bed.

1935 - Fri. Messed around. Made up Physiology expt with Jane Leeds. Home. Studied all aft. Worked also tonite & then bed, a great life, di, a great life. Letter from Bill saying he can't come to Prom & 2 C-'s in quizes - yes, a great life, a great mess!
1931 - Monday. Did a lot of work today. Saw play at S.A. for Women's Club. Bed late. Bath etc. Munny still wif me!
1932 - Wed. Crazy little notes to & from Chubby! Cooler now! Washed hair & studied(?) "Barretts of Wimpole Street" with Mother. Keen! Cried & cried! Oh me. Bed late & up early tomorrow.

1933 - Thurs. Up late. Ping Pong. John came at 12. To movies. "Murder in the Zoo" and "Harmony." Murder good. To baseball game where Yale beat Springfield. To Cous. Marg. but she wasn't there. John left & Peanut & I got our dinner. Rain & fooled.
1934 - Fri. Cut Phil. Cut in Lit. Chem quiz. No Bible class. Oh me! Chubby came for diner. We had wine & messed around. Lit tonite & generally philandered around. Bed late at that.

1935 - Sat. French & then to Agora for job Vill on skates & got a new pair, also breakfast for tomorrow. Studied in libe & then walk into woods where I thought about Bill & Prom & what is everything coming to. Cool & calm, but I'm so worried! Agora tonite & I represented Russia on minimum wage laws.
1931 - Tuesday. School again. Took sick girl home during French. Had fun with Sally this aft. She in rumble. up to heights etc.
1932 - Note to Chubby & "Anna." Fashion Show. B.B. game with Sophs. Last 1. We won 28-20. Wotta game! Picture of Chubby from Mr. Winne. John home! G. Reserves & study.

1933 - Fri. Up & said G'bye to John at 9. Breakfast in Spa! Bus 10:50-4:40. Met in Boston by Mrs. Trask & Bobby. Keeno, but yet sad. To Peabody & was most pleasantly surprised. Everett, Dan & Al tonite. Dan awfully funny! Bed late.

1934 - Sat. Lab. Lots of fun. Studied & then to Boston on 3:44. Shopped. Met Fairbanks. Dottie & Mudge & us dinner at Russian Bear. Bets & I movies "Riptide." Norma Shearer & Robt Montgomery. Wunnerful. 'Nite.

1935 - Sun. Up late. Swell rest. Corridor breakfast & then we fixed up whole corridor with our art exhibit. Studied a bit this aft. Agora for dinner. Took Judy. Home, studied. Bed not too early. German quiz tomorrow.
1931 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. Got excellent. It's about time. I was getting some French early, roller skates etc.
1932 - Fri. Chubby not at school! Boohoo. Sally away, too on account of cold. Howerver we went to see "Ben Hur" & then with Pinx, Otties, Moody & Sarah Murdoch. Bed early.
1933 - Sat. Up late. Walked to Peabody for Ginny's Hygiene etc. this a.m. Talked in aft & wrapped caramels. Wrapped again this evening & to bed quite late. Fun. I like the Trasks heaps!
1934 - Sun. Up late. Studied. Walk with Peanut & to Chapel. Studied & fooled in aft. Letters. Waited supper & then party for Dottie tonite at 10 & they liked the coffee I made.

1935 - Mon. More classes. We've been back a week & it seems like a year. Chem lab & awful results. But, oh me! Roller skated up to gym, but no classes. Home - A.A. Inagural dinner. Gertie had crazy poem(?) to me. Everybody was in stitches & I nearly died. French lecture. Home. Bed.
1931 - Thursday. Went in for Geom. after school. Ruth Challis had Mr. T home all embarassed. Ha ha!
1932 - Sat. Up early. Contribution to bake-sale & to History. Bill, Dan, Ralph, Joey & Wally here. Sally in bed today. Party at Ruff's tonite with Dan. Lousy time. (?) Pinx, Moody & Ottis to see me.

1933 - Sun. Up very late. Church. Tenor crazy! Late dinner. Met Ginny Arbuckle. Ride to Marblehead & saw ocean! Everett, Al & Bernie came in evening & we all had fun. I like them all. Bed late after talking with Peanut.
1934 - Classes not so bad. Spring is here! Physical exam. Talk with Miss Elliott. Oh me! Helped with motor test. Dinner late. French. Letter about Dammuddy & stroke! Awful bad!

1935 - Tues. Horrid rain all day, turning to sleet this aft. Physiology lab. Worked considerably. Ride to vill with Sue Potter & back with Ruth Boshovitz. Studied as usual tonite. Bill, Prom? Oh gosh, di!
1931 - Friday. Physics after school for 1st time. Mr. Bolin is very nice. Went to the movies tonite - good.

1932 - Sun. Up & to church with fambly. To Willards. Asked Bill to dance, but refused. Read "Forty-Niners." Bill, Dan & Ralph here. John Keeney, Eddy Weyman, Ki & Mr. Conneely here supper. Studied late & washed hair.

1933 - Mon. Up early. To Salem this a.m. & bought sweater & shoes. To movies this aft & waited around for pictures. Home. Supper. Fixed caramel boxes. Everett came to say G'bye to Peanut. Washed & packed & bed.
1934 - Tues. Prill ill, so since I was stiff & counting balls for Motor test we had dinner in her room. I forgot my bells & so! more next week. Studied & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Of all the blankety-blank things - snow today. About 2 inches & all slushy! Barn Board meeting this aft. Loads of fun, but I don't know. Missed 1st lacrosse. Studied & wrote up Physiology tonite.
1931 - Saturday. Went to town with Mumsie. We got me dresses, pajamas etc. Hooray! I'm going to Canada this summer.
1932 - Mon. Sally still sick. Cute notes from Chubby. Meeting after school. Studied. John left tonite. Boohoo! Bed rather late. I like Chubby best now.

1933 - Tues. Up at 8. Ginny sick. But we left at 10 anyway. Arrived Wellesly & got schedule for finals. Ugh! Zo in aft & I got B on quiz. B highest mark! Thrilled! A- on Roll call. Telegram about trip to Smith Fri! Thrills etc!

1934 - Wed. To Wellesley Hills on roller skates with Peanut to find out about Smith. Bad luck. Studied. Fooled around. Listened to KooKoo's (?) tonite. Mrs. Pennyfeather not so hot. House meeting & bed.

1935 - Thurs. Snow half way gone Grand day. Tea at Agora after nice Physiology class. I nearly died breathing etc. Tonite Fairbanks, Prill & I to Truitt's & had grand discussion on marriage & career, etc. Home. Bed late.
1931 - Sunday, Went to S.S. but not to church. Sally had to go home. Fooled around this afternoon.
1932 - Tuesday. Chubby & notes. He's dear. Stayed in for Latin, tho' late. B.B. game with New Brighton. We won! 38-20. Went swimming - Challis & Honey. Snow & home late!

1933 - Wed. Rained all day. Ginny's birthday. She's better. To vil several times. Got her socks. Sally Supplee & Bobby here for dinner. We all ate at Mrs. Wheeler's table. Fun. Surprise party for Ginny tonite. She came & slept with me!
1934 - Thurs. Peanut's birthday. Gave her perfume. She can go tomorrow. Grand. Studied about. Packed tonite or something. Concert - Lily Pons - Grand. Mlle Malbot. Party in Peanut's room Bed late.

1935 - Friday. Heard definitely from Mom that Bill can't come for Prom. Oh dear! Signed up at (?) Bureau - Oh me! Read June Play - Peanut & I went to "Hay Fever" at Z.A. tonite. Awfully good. Peanut hunt in corridor afterwards & Mudge won.
1931 - Wednesday. Mother, Sally & I drove up to see "Trader Horn" at Nixon. Fine! Sally here all nite. What ho! Lots of fun!
1932 - Fri. Cute note from Chubby - apologized! Chose wall-paper for room. Saw Miss Roy about dance next Fri. I'm chairman. Gym team meet tonite with Sally. We won. Home & bed late.

1933 - Sat. Up early. To Wesleyan (Conn) & great Scientific Conference. Saw "Rasputin" again. Saw pole vaulters etc. Science also good. Awfully tired. Home 10 (Northampton) Ate waffles & bed - real cozy. 2 weeks ago tonite!
1934 - Sun. Breakfast at Park. Jean, Ginny & I read papers. Then walk to flood. Dinner. Miss Wylie. Fooled till 4:15. Radio on bus(?) Buick - from Springfield. More fun. Home late. Studied, ate.

1935 - Mon. More Education! What a bore, 2 meetings conflicted tonite. Went to AA meeting. Gosh, di - I'm so glad I'm at last in it - after wanting to be fore 3 yrs! It's thrilling. Finished many expts for Physiology.
1931 - Thursday. Sally had picnic today at French. She wore my sweater. I took gym with her this aft. Goody goody.
1932 - Sat. Up late & studied & washed hair. Studied all aft. Tonite, Sally for supper & then to movies with Wally & Joe. Down to Sally's for eats & cards & then home.

1933 - Sun. Up at 8. Breakfast at Park. Out for a long hike. Bath & to Park for dinner & ate with Jean's house-ma - Miss Wylie. Keen. E. Swan (Swanny) Crazy. Off at 5:45. Eliot at 9:30 after crazy taxi.
1934 - Mon. B+ on Chem quiz. First gym of Spring Baseball & lacrosse. Loads of fun at baseball! Rained tho. Bells tonite & ice cream afterwards. Studied, washed hair & bed.

1935 - Tues. First Archery class. Loads of un. Miss Schroeder's swell. Out of Zo lab early as we seem to be ahead of the rest. Finished expt's & handed in quite a mess. Betty Richmond for dinner & we had quite a nice chat!
